group_1.textCenter: We'll be kicking off the event in just a moment!
All participants, please make your way@to the designated area!

group_1.textRight: Now's your time to shine, Sayaka!

group_1.textLeft: Sure…

group_1.textRight: Sayaka...why don't we go over the@rules one more time?

group_1.textLeft: Okay, but uh, Homura...doesn’t that make@three times we’ve gone over them?

group_1.textRight: B-But they said we have to prepare as thoroughly@as possible if we want to win first place...

group_1.textLeft: ...Alright, I get it.@Lead the way, then.

group_1.textRight: Okay!

group_1.textLeft: (...The moment of truth, huh.)
(Those two are getting more and more@pumped up about this.)
(*Sigh*...Why'd I have to open my stupid@mouth and agree to do this...)
(Stupid, stupid Sayaka!)

group_1.narration: The result of a rigorous lottery…
Unfortunately, we were unable to@prepare the tickets for you.

group_1.textCenter: Ahh, jeez!@It just had to be now, of all times―!!

group_1.textRight: What's wrong, Sayaka?

group_1.textLeft: …Oh…Madoka?

group_1.textRight: Hello...

group_1.textLeft: And Homura, too.@What are you guys doing out here?

group_1.textRight: We're just taking a little break from@our shopping trip.
But never mind that, Sayaka.@Is something bothering you?
I mean, your voice got so loud out@of nowhere...

group_1.textLeft: Oh…
Then that means I was loud enough for@everyone else to hear me?!

group_1.textRight: Mmhm...just a little.

group_1.textLeft: Uwaaah...that's so embarrassing...
...If you wanna know the truth, I rolled the lottery@and didn't win the ticket I was going for...
Here, the one on this poster.

group_1.textRight: A violin concert...?
Wooow! And it looks like they're holding the@performance in Kamihama.

group_1.textLeft: And the one performing is a particularly@well-renowned violinist.
It's been a while since he last came to Japan,@so tickets are in ridiculously high demand.

group_1.textRight: Hmm... I think I've heard this name somewhere@before, actually.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, you two really know your stuff.

group_1.textRight: Sayaka is the expert here.@I barely know anything at all.
Still, I feel like I heard about it from@somewhere recently...

group_1.textLeft: Maybe something else could have led you@to a topic like that?
Seems that way to me.
*Sigh* Kyosuke... I knew he would've been@so psyched about it, too...

group_1.textRight: Ah...@Could it be...
You were planning to give it to Kyosuke as a gift?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, of course!
It's a top-quality live musical performance!@There's so much to learn from it.
So it'd be way better off with him than@with someone like me.
I see...
What's wrong, Madoka?
Yeah, you're real quiet all of a sudden.

group_1.textRight: …That's it!@“Kamihama New Year's Calligraphy Rally”!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?![chara:200351:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]
Where the heck did that come from?!

group_1.textRight: Ah, sorry...uh...
It's just an event I heard about from Iroha...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, the one in Kamihama Shopping Ward, where@they’re doing calligraphy for New Year's?

group_1.textRight: That's right!@Here, this is the event location.

group_1.textLeft: Ah... The grand prize is―!
A premier ticket to a performance by the@violinist you were talking about.
So that's where you learned about it,@by skimming over this poster.

group_1.textRight: But more importantly, Sayaka!@This might just be the ultimate chance for you!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it sure does look that way!@[chara:200450:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:200450:cheek_1][chara:200450:motion_0][chara:200450:face_mtn_ex_040.exp.json][chara:200450:lipSynch_1]...Ah...but...

group_1.textRight: What's wrong, Sayaka?

group_1.textLeft: Nn...no, never mind.@It's nothing...

group_1.textRight: Sayaka...?

group_1.textLeft: (This...)
(Isn’t this a couple's ticket...?!)
